00015 short ConnCellMappingHcal::getCellIndex_fine(std::string indexStr)
00016 {
00017 
00018   _index = -1;  
00019 
00020   if (indexStr != "i" && indexStr != "j" && indexStr != "k") {
00021     std::cout << "Please use characters i,j or k !!!" << std::endl;
00022     std::cout << "Will return -1" << std::endl;
00023     return _index;
00024   } 
00025 
00026    
00027   if (indexStr == "i" ) _index = ( (obj()->getIntVal(1) >> ICOORDSHIFT) & 0xff ); 
00028   if (indexStr == "j" ) _index = ( (obj()->getIntVal(1) >> JCOORDSHIFT) & 0xff ); 
00029   if (indexStr == "k" ) _index = ( (obj()->getIntVal(1) >> KCOORDSHIFT) & 0xff ); 
00030   
00031   return _index;
00032 }
00033 
00034 
00035 short ConnCellMappingHcal::getCellIndex_coarse(std::string indexStr)
00036 {
00037 
00038   _index = -1;  
00039 
00040   if (indexStr != "i" && indexStr != "j" && indexStr != "k") {
00041     std::cout << "Please use characters i,j or k !!!" << std::endl;
00042     std::cout << "Will return -1" << std::endl;
00043     return _index;
00044   } 
00045 
00046    
00047   if (indexStr == "i" ) _index = ( (obj()->getIntVal(2) >> ICOORDSHIFT) & 0xff ); 
00048   if (indexStr == "j" ) _index = ( (obj()->getIntVal(2) >> JCOORDSHIFT) & 0xff ); 
00049   if (indexStr == "k" ) _index = ( (obj()->getIntVal(2) >> KCOORDSHIFT) & 0xff ); 
00050   
00051   return _index;
00052 }
